ruleset.name: Best Practices
ruleset.description: Rules which enforce generally accepted best practices.

rule.name: DestroyCursorRule
rule.message: Ensure that IDataCursor is destroyed after use
rule.description: Ensure that IDataCursor are always destroyed after use. Failing to do so might result in resource leaks.

rule.name: SingleTopLevelFolderRule
rule.message: Ensure there is only one folder at top level
rule.description: Ensure there is only one folder at top level.

rule.name: UniqueTopLevelFolderRule
rule.message: Ensure the top level folder {0} has the same name as package name
rule.description: Ensure the name of top level folder is the same with package name.
